sentences.en: " I think what Dr. Meade wrote about was right, Captain Butler.
sentences.cn: " 我认为米德大夫写的有关你的那些话都是对的, 巴特勒船长.

sentences.en: Against no one was feeling more bitter than against Rhett Butler.
sentences.cn: 人们对于投机商的反感最强烈的莫过于对瑞德-巴特勒了.

sentences.en: And I'm the old butler, Fraulein.
sentences.cn: 小姐,我是这儿的老管家.

sentences.en: Butler and Stone concur that the war threw people's lives into a moral relief.
sentences.cn: 巴特勒和斯通一致认为这场战争使人们的生命得到了道义上的解脱。

sentences.en: Butler felt the force of his temperament and the argument.
sentences.cn: 巴特勒感觉到他的气质和谈话的力量.

sentences.en: He disapproved heartily of Rhett Butler and poor Pitty knew it.
sentences.cn: 他从心底里不喜欢巴特勒,这是可怜的皮蒂也知道的.

sentences.en: He lived in considerable style, travelling widely, usually with a cook, valet, butler and chauffeur in attendance.
sentences.cn: 他活得相当潇洒，通常带着厨师、用人、管家和司机到处游玩。

sentences.en: I called for the butler to clear up the broken crockery.
sentences.cn: 我叫来男管家清理摔碎的陶瓷。

sentences.en: Oh, you waltz so well, Captain Butler.
sentences.cn: 唔, 巴特勒船长,你的华尔兹跳得真棒.

sentences.en: Suddenly she thought of Rhett Butler and calm dispelled her fears.
sentences.cn: 她突然想起瑞德-巴特勒,便觉得得神思镇定,不再惶恐了.

sentences.en: The butler always laid the table.
sentences.cn: 每次都是男管家把餐具摆好。

sentences.en: The butler gave a little cough to announce his presence.
sentences.cn: 男管家轻轻咳了一下,示意他已到场.

sentences.en: The butler was almost invisible in the stream of an antiquated geyser.
sentences.cn: 在这座古老的热水锅炉产生的水蒸汽中隐隐约约可以看到那个男仆的影子.

sentences.en: The butler was an accomplice in the robbery.
sentences.cn: 男管家是抢劫案的同谋犯.

sentences.en: The butler would not admit him into the house.
Well , bring him in , Captain Butler -- that is, if you can walk yourself. "
sentences.cn: " 思嘉的脑子 转 得不够快, 对眼前发生的一切都不能理解.

trans.tran_en: the main male servant of a house
